Module jBomberman
Package view

Class DecoratorProp

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Figure
model.Prop
view.DecoratorProp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<BufferedImage>, FootageFuncs
Direct Known Subclasses:
DecoratedFire, DecoratedObstacle, DecoratedPowerUp, DecoratedWall
public abstract class DecoratorProp extends Prop implements Iterable<BufferedImage>, FootageFuncs
Decorated version of a Prop to implement its View animations in a Decorator Design Patter way. Images are animated through List Collections. With this class the decorator mimics the methods of its component.

    • trespasser

      public void trespasser(LevelAbstract level)
      Description copied from class: Prop
      This method will be override if the object wants to do something before its destruction. It is a point of access to make something happen before this object gets destroyed generally it's important that a subtype of Prop (after doing its stuffs) concludes its override with the super in here. This super is required to effectively set to be fired the object if there isn't a specific mechanics doing this.
      Overrides:
      trespasser in class Prop
      Parameters:
      level - The level in which set to be fired this
